Title: Was He a Coward?
Actors: Wilfred Lucas, Joseph Graybill, W. Chrystie Miller
Plot: Norris gets a job as a ranch hand and falls in love with Kate, the rancher's daughter. The jealous foreman challenges him to a fight, but he refuses, and Kate thinks he's a coward. When smallpox hits the ranch, Norris cares for the sick at the risk of his own life, and shows Kate his true heroism.
